tool_description: Configures and manages customer privacy preferences, data visibility controls, and access restrictions across different system components.

visibility_level.description: Overall profile visibility: public, limited, private, or hidden

data_retention_preference.description: Data retention preference: minimum, standard, or extended

third_party_sharing.description: Whether to allow data sharing with third parties

analytics_participation.description: Whether to participate in analytics and research

error_messages: Customer not found: No profile exists for the provided customer_id.
Invalid visibility_level: Use one of [public, limited, private, hidden].
Invalid data_sharing_preferences: Provide valid sharing preference options.
Invalid communication_channels: Provide valid communication channel options.
Invalid data_retention_preference: Use one of [minimum, standard, extended].
Configuration conflict: Some privacy settings conflict with active service requirements.
usage: Provide customer_id, visibility_level, data_sharing_preferences, and communication_channels to configure privacy settings. The tool ensures settings are compatible with service requirements.

settings_applied.description: Whether privacy settings were successfully applied

active_settings.description: JSON string of currently active privacy settings

restrictions_count.description: Number of data access restrictions in effect

last_updated.description: When privacy settings were last modified
